mapper.update:
update america_alabama
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
entity_id_number = #{entityIdNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
entity_type = #{entityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
principal_address = #{principalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
principal_mailing_address = #{principalMailingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

registered_office_mailing_address = #{registeredOfficeMailingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update america_alabama set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entity_id_number = #{entityIdNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entity_type = #{entityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal_address = #{principalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal_mailing_address = #{principalMailingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_status = #{enterpriseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, place_of_formation = #{placeOfFormation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, formation_date = #{formationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registered_agent_name = #{registeredAgentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registered_office_street_address = #{registeredOfficeStreetAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registered_office_mailing_address = #{registeredOfficeMailingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nature_of_business = #{natureOfBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT america_alabama.id, america_alabama.enterprise_id, america_alabama.`name`, america_alabama.entity_id_number, america_alabama.entity_type, america_alabama.principal_address, america_alabama.principal_mailing_address, america_alabama.enterprise_status, america_alabama.place_of_formation, america_alabama.formation_date, america_alabama.registered_agent_name, america_alabama.registered_office_street_address, america_alabama.registered_office_mailing_address, america_alabama.nature_of_business, america_alabama_director.id AS director_id, america_alabama_director.director_name, america_alabama_director.director_street_address, america_alabama_director.director_mailing_address, america_alabama_incorporator.id AS incorporator_id, america_alabama_incorporator.incorporator_name, america_alabama_incorporator.incorporator_street_address, america_alabama_incorporator.incorporator_mailing_address, america_alabama_member.id AS member_id, america_alabama_member.member_name, america_alabama_member.member_street_address, america_alabama_member.member_mailing_address FROM america_alabama LEFT JOIN america_alabama_director ON america_alabama.enterprise_id = america_alabama_director.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN america_alabama_incorporator ON america_alabama.enterprise_id = america_alabama_incorporator.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN america_alabama_member ON america_alabama.enterprise_id = america_alabama_member.enterprise_id WHERE america_alabama.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND america_alabama.`status` = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}
